page.description: Settings for configuring the display of the summary value section in the Grid.

discussion.p: The global settings for the label and styling for summary values is set in the *[ui:Grid Properties]*. These settings control the appearance of the summary value labels, including order and where they appear in the Grid.
The *[ui:Summary value options]* section is only shown if one or more fields in the Grid have one or more summary values enabled in the [Summary values properties] for the field.
